00063 /**
00064  * Return SelfDoc option associated with a specified name.
00065  * @param std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt>& - The SelfDoc options to search.
00066  * @param const std::string& - The specified name to search for.
00067  * @return SelfDoc::Opt* - The SelfDoc option pointer or NULL if not found.
00068  */
00069 SelfDoc::Opt* CNFamilialAnalysisMethod::getSelfDocOpt(std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt>& opts, const std::string& strName)
00070 {
00071     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < opts.size()); iIndex++)
00072     {
00073         if (opts[iIndex].name == strName) {return &opts[iIndex];}
00074     }
00075     return NULL;
00076 }

00078 /**
00079  * Setup a bool parameter for this analysis method.
00080  * @param const std::string& - The name of the parameter
00081  * @param const std::string& - The prefix to use when setting up the header
00082  * @param std::map<std::string,std::string>& - A map of parameters to fill in
00083  * @param SelfDoc& - The SelfDoc object needed by the fillInValue function
00084  * @param std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt>& - The SelfDoc option to setup.
00085  * @return bool - The value of the parameter as setup by this function.
00086  */
00087 bool CNFamilialAnalysisMethod::setupBoolParameter(const std::string& strName, const std::string& strPrefix, std::map<std::string,std::string>& params, SelfDoc& doc, std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt>& opts)
00088 {
00089     SelfDoc::Opt* popt = getSelfDocOpt(opts, strName);
00090     if (popt == NULL) {throw(Except("SelfDoc::Opt not found: " + strName));}
00091     bool b = AffxByteArray(popt->defaultVal).parsebool();
00092     fillInValue(b, std::string(strName), params, doc);
00093     std::wstring wstr = affymetrix_calvin_utilities::StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(strPrefix + strName);
00094     affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType param;
00095     param.SetName(wstr);
00096     param.SetValueInt8(b);
00097     m_vParams.push_back(param);
00098     return b;
00099 }

00101 /**
00102  * Setup an int parameter for this analysis method, including min amd max validation.
00103  * @param const std::string& - The name of the parameter
00104  * @param const std::string& - The prefix to use when setting up the header
00105  * @param std::map<std::string,std::string>& - A map of parameters to fill in
00106  * @param SelfDoc& - The SelfDoc object needed by the fillInValue function
00107  * @param std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt>& - The SelfDoc option to setup.
00108  * @return int - The value of the parameter as setup by this function.
00109  */
00110 int CNFamilialAnalysisMethod::setupIntParameter(const std::string& strName, const std::string& strPrefix, std::map<std::string,std::string>& params, SelfDoc& doc, std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt>& opts)
00111 {
00112     SelfDoc::Opt* popt = getSelfDocOpt(opts, strName);
00113     if (popt == NULL) {throw(Except("SelfDoc::Opt not found: " + strName));}
00114     int i = ::getInt(popt->defaultVal);
00115     fillInValue(i, std::string(strName), params, doc);
00116     if ((popt->minVal != "NA") && (popt->minVal != "") && (i < ::getInt(popt->minVal))) {throw(Except("SelfDoc::Opt " + strName + " below minimum value of " + popt->minVal));}
00117     if ((popt->maxVal != "NA") && (popt->maxVal != "") && (i > ::getInt(popt->maxVal))) {throw(Except("SelfDoc::Opt " + strName + " above maximum value of " + popt->maxVal));}
00118     std::wstring wstr = affymetrix_calvin_utilities::StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(strPrefix + strName);
00119     affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType param;
00120     param.SetName(wstr);
00121     param.SetValueInt32(i);
00122     m_vParams.push_back(param);
00123     return i;
00124 }

00126 /**
00127  * Setup a float parameter for this analysis method, including min amd max validation.
00128  * @param const std::string& - The name of the parameter
00129  * @param const std::string& - The prefix to use when setting up the header
00130  * @param std::map<std::string,std::string>& - A map of parameters to fill in
00131  * @param SelfDoc& - The SelfDoc object needed by the fillInValue function
00132  * @param std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt>& - The SelfDoc option to setup.
00133  * @return float - The value of the parameter as setup by this function.
00134  */
00135 float CNFamilialAnalysisMethod::setupFloatParameter(const std::string& strName, const std::string& strPrefix, std::map<std::string,std::string>& params, SelfDoc& doc, std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt>& opts)
00136 {
00137     SelfDoc::Opt* popt = getSelfDocOpt(opts, strName);
00138     if (popt == NULL) {throw(Except("SelfDoc::Opt not found: " + strName));}
00139     float f = (float)::getDouble(popt->defaultVal);
00140     fillInValue(f, std::string(strName), params, doc);
00141     if ((popt->minVal != "NA") && (popt->minVal != "") && (f < (float)::getDouble(popt->minVal))) {throw(Except("SelfDoc::Opt " + strName + " below minimum value of " + popt->minVal));}
00142     if ((popt->maxVal != "NA") && (popt->maxVal != "") && (f > (float)::getDouble(popt->maxVal))) {throw(Except("SelfDoc::Opt " + strName + " above maximum value of " + popt->maxVal));}
00143     std::wstring wstr = affymetrix_calvin_utilities::StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(strPrefix + strName);
00144     affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType param;
00145     param.SetName(wstr);
00146     param.SetValueFloat(f);
00147     m_vParams.push_back(param);
00148     return f;
00149 }

00151 /**
00152  * Setup a string parameter for this analysis method, including min amd max validation.
00153  * @param const std::string& - The name of the parameter
00154  * @param const std::string& - The prefix to use when setting up the header
00155  * @param std::map<std::string,std::string>& - A map of parameters to fill in
00156  * @param SelfDoc& - The SelfDoc object needed by the fillInValue function
00157  * @param std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt>& - The SelfDoc option to setup.
00158  * @return std::string - The value of the parameter as setup by this function.
00159  */
00160 std::string CNFamilialAnalysisMethod::setupStringParameter(const std::string& strName, const std::string& strPrefix, std::map<std::string,std::string>& params, SelfDoc& doc, std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt>& opts)
00161 {
00162     SelfDoc::Opt* popt = getSelfDocOpt(opts, strName);
00163     if (popt == NULL) {throw(Except("SelfDoc::Opt not found: " + strName));}
00164     std::string str = popt->defaultVal;
00165     fillInValue(str, std::string(strName), params, doc);
00166     if ((popt->minVal != "") && (str < popt->minVal)) {throw(Except("SelfDoc::Opt " + strName + " below minimum value of " + popt->minVal));}
00167     if ((popt->maxVal != "") && (str > popt->maxVal)) {throw(Except("SelfDoc::Opt " + strName + " above maximum value of " + popt->maxVal));}
00168     std::wstring wstr = affymetrix_calvin_utilities::StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(strPrefix + strName);
00169     affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType param;
00170     param.SetName(wstr);
00171     param.SetValueAscii(str);
00172     m_vParams.push_back(param);
00173     return str;
00174 }

00176 /**
00177  * @brief Create new segments for the familial file
00178  * @param CNCychp& - Index's cychp data
00179  * @param CNCychp& - Parent's cychp data
00180  * @param int - The sample key for the parent
00181  * @param CNSegmentArray& - The segment array to load
00182  * @param int - The segment type to use
00183  * @param int - The desired call to load
00184  * @param int - The marker count cutoff
00185  * @param int - The call cutoff
00186  * @param int - The minimum genomic span for this type of segment
00187  */
00188 void CNFamilialAnalysisMethod::newSegments(CNCychp& cychpReference, CNCychp& cychpFamilial, int iFamilialSampleKey, CNSegmentArray& vSegments, int iSegmentType, int iDesiredCall, int iMarkerCountCutoff, int iHetCutoff, int iMinGenomicSpan)
00189 {
00190     vSegments.deleteAll();
00191     int iSnpCount = cychpReference.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getCount();
00192     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < iSnpCount); iIndex++)
00193     {
00194         CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber* pobjSnp = cychpFamilial.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().at(iIndex);
00195         pobjSnp->setSegmentOutput(-1);
00196     }
00197     CNAnalysisMethodLOH objSegmentAnalysis;
00198     int iLastChromosome = cychpReference.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().at(iSnpCount - 1)->getChromosome();
00199     for (int iChromosome = 1; (iChromosome <= iLastChromosome); iChromosome++)
00200     {
00201         int iChromosomeSnpCount = 0;
00202         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < iSnpCount); iIndex++)
00203         {
00204             CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber* pobjSnp = cychpFamilial.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().at(iIndex);
00205             if ((pobjSnp->getSegmentInput() >= 0) && (pobjSnp->getChromosome() == iChromosome))
00206             {
00207                 iChromosomeSnpCount++;
00208             }
00209         }
00210         std::vector<char> vChromosomeGenotypeCalls(iChromosomeSnpCount);
00211         std::vector<int> vChromosomePositions(iChromosomeSnpCount);
00212         std::vector<int> vChromosomeSnpIndexes(iChromosomeSnpCount);
00213         int iSnpIndex = 0;
00214         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < iSnpCount); iIndex++)
00215         {
00216             CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber* pobjSnp = cychpFamilial.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().at(iIndex);
00217             if ((pobjSnp->getSegmentInput() >= 0) && (pobjSnp->getChromosome() == iChromosome))
00218             {
00219                 vChromosomeGenotypeCalls[iSnpIndex] = pobjSnp->getSegmentInput();
00220                 vChromosomePositions[iSnpIndex] = pobjSnp->getPosition();
00221                 vChromosomeSnpIndexes[iSnpIndex] = iIndex;
00222                 iSnpIndex++;
00223             }
00224         }
00225         int iStartIndex = 0;
00226         for (int iIndex = 1; (iIndex <= iChromosomeSnpCount); iIndex++)
00227         {
00228             if ((iIndex == iChromosomeSnpCount) || ((cychpFamilial.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().at(vChromosomeSnpIndexes[iIndex])->getPosition() - cychpFamilial.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().at(vChromosomeSnpIndexes[iIndex - 1])->getPosition()) > 1000000))
00229             {
00230                 int iSegmentSnpCount = ((iIndex - 1) - iStartIndex + 1);
00231                 if (iSegmentSnpCount >= iMarkerCountCutoff)
00232                 {
00233                     std::vector<char> vSegmentGenotypeCalls(iSegmentSnpCount);
00234                     std::vector<int> vSegmentPositions(iSegmentSnpCount);
00235                     std::vector<char> vLoh(iSegmentSnpCount);
00236                     for (int iSegmentIndex = 0; (iSegmentIndex < iSegmentSnpCount); iSegmentIndex++)
00237                     {
00238                         vSegmentGenotypeCalls[iSegmentIndex] = vChromosomeGenotypeCalls[iStartIndex + iSegmentIndex];
00239                         vSegmentPositions[iSegmentIndex] = vChromosomePositions[iStartIndex + iSegmentIndex];
00240                     }
00241                     objSegmentAnalysis.lohFind(vSegmentGenotypeCalls, vSegmentPositions, iMarkerCountCutoff, iHetCutoff, iMinGenomicSpan, vLoh);
00242                     for (int iSegmentIndex = 0; (iSegmentIndex < iSegmentSnpCount); iSegmentIndex++)
00243                     {
00244                         cychpFamilial.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().at(vChromosomeSnpIndexes[iStartIndex + iSegmentIndex])->setSegmentOutput(vLoh[iSegmentIndex]);
00245                     }
00246                 }
00247                 iStartIndex = iIndex;
00248             }
00249         }
00250     }
00251 
00252     int iMarkerCount = 0;
00253     CNSegment* pobjSegment = NULL;
00254     CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber* pobjSnp = NULL;
00255     CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber* pIndexSnp = NULL;
00256     int iStartIndex = 0;
00257     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < cychpFamilial.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getCount()); iIndex++)
00258     {
00259         pobjSnp = cychpFamilial.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getAt(iIndex);
00260         pIndexSnp = cychpReference.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getAt(iIndex);
00261         if (pobjSnp->getSegmentOutput() != -1)
00262         {
00263             iStartIndex = iIndex + 1;
00264             break;
00265         }
00266         pobjSnp = NULL;
00267         pIndexSnp = NULL;
00268     }
00269     int iHetCount = 0;
00270     int iHomCount = 0;
00271     int iAgreeMarkerCount = 0;
00272     if (pobjSnp != NULL)
00273     {
00274         iHetCount = 0;
00275         iHomCount = 0;
00276         pobjSegment = new CNSegment;
00277         pobjSegment->setSegmentType(iSegmentType);
00278         pobjSegment->setFamilialSampleKey(iFamilialSampleKey);
00279         pobjSegment->setChromosome(pobjSnp->getChromosome());
00280         pobjSegment->setStartPosition(pobjSnp->getPosition());
00281         pobjSegment->setEndPosition(pobjSnp->getPosition());
00282         pobjSegment->setCall((char)pobjSnp->getSegmentOutput());
00283         if ((pobjSnp->getSegmentInput() == 0) && (pobjSnp->getSegmentOutput() == 1)) {iAgreeMarkerCount++;}
00284         if ((pobjSnp->getSegmentInput() == 1) && (pobjSnp->getSegmentOutput() == 0)) {iAgreeMarkerCount++;}
00285         if (pIndexSnp->getGenotypeCall() == 1) {iHetCount++;} else if (pIndexSnp->getGenotypeCall() != -1) {iHomCount++;}
00286         iMarkerCount = 1;
00287         for (int iIndex = iStartIndex; (iIndex < cychpFamilial.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getCount()); iIndex++)
00288         {
00289             pobjSnp = cychpFamilial.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getAt(iIndex);
00290             pIndexSnp = cychpReference.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getAt(iIndex);
00291             if (pobjSnp->getSegmentOutput() != -1)
00292             {
00293                 if ((pobjSnp->getChromosome() != pobjSegment->getChromosome()) || (pobjSnp->getSegmentOutput() != pobjSegment->getCall()))
00294                 {
00295                     pobjSegment->setSegmentName(affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid());
00296                     pobjSegment->setMarkerCount(iMarkerCount);
00297                     pobjSegment->setHeterozygosity((double)iHetCount / (double)iMarkerCount);
00298                     pobjSegment->setHomozygosity((double)iHomCount / (double)iMarkerCount);
00299                     pobjSegment->setConfidence((double)iAgreeMarkerCount / (double)iMarkerCount);
00300                     if ((iDesiredCall == -1) || (pobjSegment->getCall() == iDesiredCall))
00301                     {
00302                         pobjSegment->setCall(1);
00303                         vSegments.add(pobjSegment);
00304                     } else {delete pobjSegment;}
00305                     iHetCount = 0;
00306                     iHomCount = 0;
00307                     pobjSegment = new CNSegment;
00308                     pobjSegment->setSegmentType(iSegmentType);
00309                     pobjSegment->setFamilialSampleKey(iFamilialSampleKey);
00310                     pobjSegment->setChromosome(pobjSnp->getChromosome());
00311                     pobjSegment->setStartPosition(pobjSnp->getPosition());
00312                     pobjSegment->setCall((char)pobjSnp->getSegmentOutput());
00313                     iAgreeMarkerCount = 0;
00314                     iMarkerCount = 0;
00315                 }
00316                 if ((pobjSnp->getSegmentInput() == 0) && (pobjSnp->getSegmentOutput() == 1)) {iAgreeMarkerCount++;}
00317                 if ((pobjSnp->getSegmentInput() == 1) && (pobjSnp->getSegmentOutput() == 0)) {iAgreeMarkerCount++;}
00318                 if (pIndexSnp->getGenotypeCall() == 1) {iHetCount++;} else if (pIndexSnp->getGenotypeCall() != -1) {iHomCount++;}
00319                 iMarkerCount++;
00320                 pobjSegment->setEndPosition(pobjSnp->getPosition());
00321             }
00322         }
00323     }
00324     if (pobjSegment != NULL)
00325     {
00326         pobjSegment->setMarkerCount(iMarkerCount);
00327         pobjSegment->setSegmentName(affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid());
00328         pobjSegment->setHeterozygosity((double)iHetCount / (double)iMarkerCount);
00329         pobjSegment->setHomozygosity((double)iHomCount / (double)iMarkerCount);
00330         pobjSegment->setConfidence((double)iAgreeMarkerCount / (double)iMarkerCount);
00331         if (pobjSegment->getCall() == iDesiredCall)
00332         {
00333             pobjSegment->setCall(1);
00334             vSegments.add(pobjSegment);
00335         } else {delete pobjSegment;}
00336     }
00337 }

00339 /**
00340  * @brief Anneal segment input field in the specified cychp data
00341  * @param CNCychp& - The cychp data to anneal
00342  */
00343 void CNFamilialAnalysisMethod::anneal(CNCychp& cychp)
00344 {
00345     for (int i = 1; (i < (cychp.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getCount() - 1)); i++)
00346     {
00347         CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber* p0 = cychp.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getAt(i - 1);
00348         CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber* p1 = cychp.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getAt(i);
00349         CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber* p2 = cychp.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getAt(i + 1);
00350         if (p1->getSegmentInput() == -1)
00351         {
00352             if (p0->getSegmentInput() == p2->getSegmentInput())
00353             {
00354                 p1->setSegmentInput(p0->getSegmentInput());
00355             }
00356         }
00357     }
00358 }

00361 void CNFamilialAnalysisMethod::addGroupDataset(const string& group, const string& dataset)
00362 {
00363     m_groupDatasets[group].insert(dataset);
